item.title: About
item.description: Hmm If you already visited the home page, you presumably read and acquired sufficient knowledge about me. Then why does this page exist? I don’t know, I still need to figure that out for myself üòê. I believe that someday perhaps I’ll have a lot to talk about myself. The homepage would probably not accomodate all the content and that’s when I would get back to this page - to reflect upon the true purpose of my life.

item.title: Projects
item.description: This page showcases a list of projects(FOSS and closed source) developed by me over the period of time. Order is random and does not depict popularity or timeline.
